about:
React.js, Vue.js, Node.js and MongoDB Specialist!


I am a FullStack JavaScript developer with more than 8 years of experience with extensive skillset of delivering applications using MEAN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS and Node.js) MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReacrJS and Node). I have proven experience of assisting my clients with entire development cycle starting from requirements gathering, application GUI, application front-end and back-end development, their integration. In my extensive career, I have helped clients from varied domains to develop robust solutions that still generate a great ROI. Some domains include healthcare, eCommerce, learning management, real estate, etc.
